description: Windows host dashboard for telegraf metrics pumped into influxdb

targets.query: SELECT mean("Percent_Processor_Time") FROM "win_cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "device" = 'C:') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Percent_Free_Space") FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" = 'D:' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("Processes") FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "objectname" = 'System' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last("Threads") FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "objectname" = 'System' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_cpus") AS "mean_n_cpus" FROM "system"  WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Percent_Processor_Time") AS "% CPU Usage" FROM "win_cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "% Memory Usage" FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path", "device", "fstype" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT mean("state") FROM "win_services" WHERE ("service_name" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "service_name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("state") FROM "win_services" WHERE ("service_name" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "service_name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Percent_Processor_Time") as "% Processor Time" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND instance =~ /$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(linear)
SELECT mean("Handle_Count") as "Handle Count" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND instance =~ /$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(0)
SELECT mean("Private_Bytes") as "Private Bytes" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND instance =~ /$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(0)
SELECT mean("Virtual_Bytes") as "Virtual Bytes" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND instance =~ /$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(0)
SELECT mean("Working_Set") as "Working Set" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND instance =~ /$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(0)

list.label: Hostname
list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_system" WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_disk" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/
list.label: disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_disk" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

list.label: Process
list.name: process
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_proc" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

list.label: Network Interface
list.name: network
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_net" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/
list.label: interface
list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_services" WITH KEY = "service_name" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/
list.label: Windows Service
list.name: service
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_services" WITH KEY = "service_name" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/
list.label: CPU
list.name: cpu
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

title: Dashboard - Windows
